hero_subtitle: taking some time off after playing with robotic arms and machine learning at Pickle Robot Co for two years. Before that, I worked on interactive maps for DSTI in Sierra Leone. I've also taught autonomous boats how to shapeshift for my thesis in the Senseable City Lab and know a thing or two about control systems and optimization and negotiation. I like tea (jasmine, licorice root, rooibos), vegan food, community radio (WMBR, dublab), and sleep.
